title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: It might be necessary to take a calculated risk in order to shake up a routine thats grown inefficient. Too much caution may be tied to fear of failure and encourages procrastination. But recklessness leads to waste and confusion. Thankfully, theres no need to overreact and throw the baby out with the bathwater since the heroic Leo Moon in your 6th House of Daily Flow receives cosmic assistance from insistent Mars. Careful observation results in a discovery that could make an immediate difference. Supreme Court Justice Oliver Wendell Holmes wrote, A moments insight is sometimes worth a lifes experience. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
